attributes.action: Ban Alcohol In Media & On TV & Bill Boards & Sponsors Of Major Sport Events
attributes.additional_details: The Goverment Baned  Smokeing On TV & took away sponsoship from Major Sport Events. Want this to happen with Alcohol as Alcholism is a Very Serious illness and this needs to premeoted more on TV & Hospitals.The Goverment need to Seriously Wake Up & Smell the Roses as Alcohol is a Major Killer
